ca.ualberta.trinkettrader

Class ApplicationState

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.ApplicationState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public class ApplicationState
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    Singleton utility class responsible for handling the clicking of friends in a user's friend's list, trinkets in a user's inventory, and trades in the user's active and past trade lists. Each time a friend, trinket, or trade is clicked in a list, this class will be used in the onItemClick method of the respective controller to set the object which was clicked. For more information, please see the respective controllers: for clicked friends - FriendsListController for clicked trinkets - InventoryController for clicked trades - ActiveTradesController , PastTradesController

      Returns the trade most recently clicked on from the Active Trades ListView (currentTradesListView) or the Past Trades ListView (pastTradesListView).
      Trinket getClickedTrinket()
      Returns the trinket most recently clicked on from the Inventory ListView.

      Returns the instance of the singleton

        public void addObserver(java.util.Observer observer)

      • deleteObserver

        public void deleteObserver(java.util.Observer observer)

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers()
        If hasChanged() returns true, calls the update() method for every observer in the list of observers using null as the argument. Afterwards, calls clearChanged().

        Equivalent to calling notifyObservers(null).

        Specified by:
        notifyObservers in interface Observable
